Episode.EpisodeName: Rick and Morty Presents Jerry's Game from Adult Swim Games
Episode.Overview: From Adult Swim's Rick and Morty comes Jerry's Game, the pinnacle of mobile gaming! Step into the shoes of Morty's Dad, Jerry Smith, and invest your free time in our balloon-popping simulator for accomplished, respected individuals. Need encouragement for performing infant-level motor functions? Do you wish bubble wrap came with achievements? Jerry's Game has all of this and more! Download it and get poppin’!
